welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Le Haillan, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the beauty and culture our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mérignac Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mérignac Airport, used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal Billi
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Mérignac Airport, primarily used for international flights and equipped with modern amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 2-hour time limit per session.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
